actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to make appointments to the Committee on Appropriations, the Committee on Environment and Public Works, the Special Committee on Aging, and the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

summary.text: Appoints: (1) Senator Conrad of North Dakota to serve on the Senate Committee on Appropriations for the 102d Congress; and (2) Senator Burdick of North Dakota to serve on the Committee on Environment and Public Works, the Special Committee on Aging, and the Select Committee on Indian Affairs for the 102d Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to make appointments to the Committee on Appropriations, the Committee on Environment and Public Works, the Special Committee on Aging, and the Select Committee on Indian Affairs.
